fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 1Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 1Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level multiplication of two calculated fields to an inline DAX measure, replacing field references with the table[column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The dependent calculated field 'Date Sign' references Tableau parameters; any calculation depending on parameters must be a measure.
